title: Large-scale Museum Game-based Learning Design: Exploring Cultural Heritage through a Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Cultural Heritage and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Establishing a field-linked learning environment using smartphones, enabling collaboration with museums.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze historical contexts of museum exhibits in three or more ways using game mechanics
Learners can propose cultural heritage preservation plans through simulation games by collaborating with peers in PBL format
Learners can create interactive learning materials about exhibits using smartphone-based game tools

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Game Development Tools (e.g., ARIS, Twine)
Museum Collaboration Resources (Digital Archives, On-Site Access Permissions)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
